::DrillBit::

DrillBit stayed at KitKat's side, but switched his right hand, to
gattaling gun mode. 
"Lets hope we dont have to fight, we wont be able to take it.", he said,
to Phobia.

::Hot Rod::

He walked to the Mess Hall, with Feline. He got some energin and
energon, and sat down.

::K9::

K9 was drunk, and uncouncious, at the table next to Hot Rod.
